subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: In protest of sponsors who have not paid the team, the riders for Astana, including Lance Armstrong, blanked out company names for today's Giro d'Italia stage.
snippet: In protest of sponsors who have not paid the team, the riders for Astana, including Lance Armstrong, blanked out company names for today's Giro d'Italia stage.
